snippet: New York University’s ambitious plan for expansion is good for the entire city, but the university should make it workable for nearby residents.
abstract: Editorial expresses qualified support for New York University's ambitious plan for expansion in New York City; urges the university to make the plan workable for nearby residents.
lead_paragraph: New York University’s ambitious plan for expansion is good for the entire city, but the university should make it workable for nearby residents.

headline.seo: Let N.Y.U. Expand in Its Backyard
headline.main: Let N.Y.U. Expand in Its Backyard
headline.print_headline: Let N.Y.U. Expand in Its Backyard
